text:
Yeah! Finished! Ready to send to my auntie.
Hey, Maggie! Come on, come on! Let´s play,

let´s play!
Ok, coming Steve.

Great! Let´s play hide and seek.
This is the base.

Aha.
I´ll count to twenty and you go and hide.

Ok.
Hehey!

1… 2… 3… oh, hey, hello! Me and Maggie
are playing hide and seek here in the garden.

Hey, look. There are lots of flowers and there
is a tree in my garden. So what is it? Yeah!

It´s a garden. Say it with me. Loudly. What
is it? It´s a garden. What is it? It´s a

garden. What is it? It´s a garden. Yeah!
Hurry up Steve! Let´s play!

Sorry Maggie. Ok. 1… 2… miss a few…
19, 20! Coming! Ready or not. Ok, where is

Maggie?
Is she in the shed? In the garage? Oh hey,

look. The window in the basement is open.
Maybe Maggie is hiding in the basement. Let´s

look. Maggie! Maggie! Hey, can you see Maggie?
Where is that naughty bird? There are spiders

here, oh, and it´s cold. Hey, you know what
this is, don´t you? Yeah. It´s a basement.

Look, there is a small window. So, hey, say
it with me. What is it? It´s a basement.

Say it again. What is it? It´s a basement.
Let me hear you. What is it? It´s a basement.

Yeah! Well done!
I´m in the basement. The basement. Oh, no,

Maggie is not here. Oh, she likes to be up
high. Let´s look in the loft. Maggie! Maggie!

I´m going to find you in the loft. Hey, can
you see Maggie here, in the loft?

Shhhh. Oh-oh. Shhh. Be quiet. Steve´s here.
Hahaha.

Yes? You can see Maggie? Here? But what room
is this? Look, there is an old sofa. There

are three old tables. So what room is this?
Yeah.

Both: It´s a loft.
M: Oh, shhh.

Hey, say it with me as I look for Maggie.
It´s a loft. What is it? It´s a loft. What

is it? It´s a loft. Oh but where is Maggie?
Oh-oh silly Steve!

Hey, found you Maggie!
Yeah.

Ha! I win. Ok, my turn to hide now.
Ok.

And your turn to seek.
Yeah!

Let´s go back to the garden. Ok.
That was a good hiding place in the loft.

Yeah!
Now it´s my turn to hide. You count to twenty

Maggie.
Ok.

Let´s go!
Yeah!

M: 1…
Hey, I can hide in the shed.

M: 2…
You don´t know what a shed is? This is a

shed.
M: 3…

Look, there are tools for the garden. Yeah!
M: 4…

Hey, say it with me. But quietly. What is
it?

M: 5…
It´s a shed. What is it? It´s a shed. And

again. What is it?
M: 6…

It´s a shed. Well done!
M: 7…

So I am going to hide in the shed.
M: 8…

Auuuu!
Haha! So Steve is in the shed.

Oh no!
M: 9…

I can´t hide in a shed now.
M: 10...

Where can I hide?
M: 11…

A-ha the garage!
M: 12…

Hey, I can hide in here.
M: 13…

What is it?
M: 14…

Yeah! It´s a garage. Say it with me. But
quietly. What is it? It´s a garage. What

is it? It´s a garage. What is it? It´s a
garage. Yeah! I can hide in the garage. Oh

no! Look, there is a car in the garage.
M: 15…

Oh, where can I hide now?
M: 16…

Oh hey, I can hide in that box, yeah!
M: 17…

Oh, Maggie will never find me now.
18…19…20! Haha! Coming! Ready or not.

Oh, let´s look in the shed. Yeah!
Oh no! Oh! Maggie will never find me now!
